title: Form spacing: Density
code:
<gds-flex width="100%" padding="2xl" justify-content="center">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" width="100px" margin="4xl 0 0 0" gap="4xl">
    <gds-badge variant="notice">XS (8)
      <gds-icon-square-placeholder slot="lead" solid="true">
    </gds-badge>

    </gds-badge>

          <gds-icon-square-placeholder slot="lead" solid="true">
      </gds-badge>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xs" padding="2xl" width="100%">
    <gds-flex align-items="flex-start">

    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" width="100%" gap="xs">
      <gds-flex align-items="flex-start" width="100%">
        <gds-input label="E-postadress" size="small"></gds-input>
      </gds-flex>
      <gds-flex align-items="flex-start">

</gds-flex>
